sakura:BottledLove.NAME: Bottled Love
DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, choose a card. Upon taking damage, that card's damage is increased by 1 for the combat..
will increase in damage by 1 upon taking damage.
sakura:BottledLove.FLAVOR: The world outside is filled with impurities. People I hate. People in my way. Liars. Dirty people. I need to exterminate all risks.

sakura:PurpleSoulGem.NAME: Purple Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Restart the battle and all enemies deal 20% more damage.
